BUTTON.SCRIPT: local parent = UISelf:GetParent():GetParent() parent:Visible(false) DropElementOnClick(UISelf, UISelf:GetParent():GetCustomDataAsInt())

FULL_FORM.SCRIPT:
g_bEnableShortCutKey = false PlayBgSoundByPath("../BGM/myroom_bg.mp3", 1.0, 0 )
--local kWnd = UISelf local kScreenSize = GetScreenSize() local kPos = kWnd:GetLocation() kPos:SetX( (kScreenSize:GetX() - kWnd:GetSize():GetX() ) / 2 ) kPos:SetY( (kScreenSize:GetY() - kWnd:GetSize():GetY() ) / 2 ) kWnd:SetLocation( kPos )

FORM.SCRIPT: -- local kChatOut = GetUIWnd("ChatOut") local kChatBar = GetUIWnd("ChatBar") kChatOut:SetLocation( Point2( UISelf:GetLocation():GetX() + 14, UISelf:GetLocation():GetY() + UISelf:GetSize():GetY() - kChatOut:GetSize():GetY() - 68 ) ) kChatBar:SetLocation( Point2( kChatOut:GetLocation():GetX(), kChatOut:GetLocation():GetY() + kChatOut:GetSize():GetY() + 10 ) )
FORM.HOTKEY: if(3 ~= GetShopType()) then return g_ChatMgrClient:OnFocus_ChatEdit() end
if(3 ~= GetShopType()) then return g_ChatMgrClient:OnFocus_ChatEdit() end

CHECK_BUTTON.SCRIPT: local tab1 = UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("CBTN_LEFT_TAB1") if false==tab1:IsNil() then tab1:CheckState(false) tab1:LockClick(false) end UISelf:CheckState(true) UISelf:LockClick(true) local best = UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("FRM_BEST") local rank = UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("FRM_RANK") if false==best:IsNil() then best:Visible(true) end if false==rank:IsNil() then rank:Visible(false) end

local tab0 = UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("CBTN_LEFT_TAB0") if false==tab0:IsNil() then tab0:CheckState(false) tab0:LockClick(false) end UISelf:CheckState(true) UISelf:LockClick(true) local best = UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("FRM_BEST") local rank = UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("FRM_RANK") if false==best:IsNil() then best:Visible(false) end if false==rank:IsNil() then rank:Visible(true) end

NAME.SCRIPT: local MyLevel = GetMyActorValue(AT_LEVEL) if 50 > MyLevel then CommonMsgBoxByTextTable(403707, true) else BuyCashItemOnClick(UISelf, CIBT_GIFT) end
local MyLevel = GetMyActorValue(AT_LEVEL) if 50 > MyLevel then CommonMsgBoxByTextTable(403707, true) else BuyCashItemOnClick(UISelf, CIBT_GIFT) end

IMG.SCRIPT: if UISelf:IsVisible() then if( CheckNil(g_world == nil) ) then return false end if( CheckNil(g_world:IsNil()) ) then return false end UISelf:SetUVIndex(math.floor(math.mod(g_world:GetAccumTime()*5,3))+1) end

if UISelf:IsVisible() then if( CheckNil(g_world == nil) ) then return false end if( CheckNil(g_world:IsNil()) ) then return false end UISelf:SetUVIndex(math.floor(math.mod(g_world:GetAccumTime()*5,2))+1) end

BUTTON.SCRIPT: local UIModel = UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("FRM_UIMODEL") if not UIModel:IsNil() then UIModel:UpdateOrthoZoom("CashPreviewActor", 0.5, 0, 25) end
local UIModel = UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("FRM_UIMODEL") if not UIModel:IsNil() then UIModel:UpdateOrthoZoom("CashPreviewActor", 1.0, 0, 0) end
if UISelf:IsMouseDown() == true then RotatePreviewActor(0.08) end
if UISelf:IsMouseDown() == true then RotatePreviewActor(-0.08) end

CHECK_BUTTON.SCRIPT: if(UISelf:GetBuildIndex() == 0) then UISelf:CheckState(true) UISelf:LockClick(true) end local iPageNo = UISelf:GetBuildIndex()+1 UISelf:SetCustomDataAsInt(iPageNo) UISelf:SetStaticText(tostring(iPageNo))

BUTTON.SCRIPT: if(false == ReqStartCSGachaRoulette()) then CommonMsgBoxByTextTable(550005, true) return end Roulette_StartBtnDisable(true)

CHECK_BUTTON.SCRIPT: local iTTNo = 0 local kSelf = UISelf if 3 > kSelf:GetBuildIndex() then iTTNo = 790729+UISelf:GetBuildIndex() elseif kSelf:GetBuildIndex() == 3 then iTTNo = 790790 elseif kSelf:GetBuildIndex() == 4 then iTTNo = 790791 end CallToolTipText(0, GetTextW(iTTNo), GetUIWnd("Cursor"):GetLocation())
if(UISelf:GetBuildIndex() == 0) then UISelf:CheckState(true) UISelf:LockClick(true) else UISelf:CheckState(false) UISelf:LockClick(false) end

local iTTNo = 0 local kSelf = UISelf if 3 > kSelf:GetBuildIndex() then iTTNo = 790701+kSelf:GetBuildIndex() elseif kSelf:GetBuildIndex() == 3 then iTTNo = 790713 elseif kSelf:GetBuildIndex() == 4 then iTTNo = 790714 end kSelf:SetStaticTextW( GetTT(iTTNo) )

if(UISelf:GetBuildIndex() == 0) then UISelf:CheckState(true) UISelf:LockClick(true) local iPageNo = UISelf:GetBuildIndex()+1 UISelf:SetCustomDataAsInt(iPageNo) UISelf:SetStaticText(tostring(iPageNo)) end

BUTTON.SCRIPT: local bg = UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("SFRM_LIST_BG") local list = bg:GetControl("LST_TO") if false==bg:IsNil() then local bv = bg:IsVisible() if true==bv then bg:Visible(false) else local count = g_FriendMgr:Friend_Count() if 0 >= count then bg:Visible(false) else bg:Visible(true) list:ClearAllListItem() for i=0,count do local friend = g_FriendMgr:FriendItem_ByAt(i) if false == friend:IsNil() then list:AddNewListItem(friend:CharacterName()) end end local size = math.min(4,count) local pt = Point2(list:GetSize():GetX(), size*22) list:SetSize(pt) bg:GetControl("IMG_BOTTOM"):SetLocation(Point2(-1, pt:GetY())) bg:SetSize(pt) bg:SetImgSize(pt) end end end return true

local parent = UISelf:GetParent():GetParent() local edit_to = parent:GetParent():GetControl("SFRM_FRIEND_BG") if false==edit_to:IsNil() then edit_to:SetStaticTextW(UISelf:GetStaticText()) end parent:Visible(false)

FORM.SCRIPT: local kSelf = UISelf local Parent = kSelf:GetParent() local kCash = Parent:GetControl("FRM_CASH") local kCost = Parent:GetControl("FRM_COST") if not kCash:IsNil() and not kCost:IsNil() then local kCash = tonumber(kCash:GetStaticText():GetStr()) local kCost = tonumber(kCost:GetStaticText():GetStr()) local kValue = kCash - kCost kSelf:SetStaticText(tostring(kValue)) end
